What are the benefits of the Telenor Monthly EasyCard package?

The Monthly EasyCard package offers 10GBs of internet plus an additional 10GBs from 1am to 9am, 4,000 Telenor & PTCL minutes, 350 offnet minutes, and 2,000 SMS for Rs. 780 including tax. You can activate this package by dialing *345*80#, through the MyTelenor App, Easypaisa, or your nearest retailer for Rs. 800.
